statements: SELECT id, wavelength, intensity, location, timestamp FROM hyperspectral_data;
SELECT location, intensity, wavelength, timestamp, id FROM hyperspectral_data;
SELECT wavelength, id, location FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT intensity, wavelength, timestamp FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE location = 'Lab';
SELECT * FROM hyperspectral_data ORDER BY intensity DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, wavelength, intensity, location, timestamp FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE location = 'Lab A' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, intensity, wavelength, timestamp FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE wavelength > 500 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, location, intensity FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location, intensity DESC;
SELECT * FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE location IN ('Lab A', 'Lab B') AND wavelength < 600 ORDER BY id LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, wavelength, location FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE intensity BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0 ORDER BY wavelength DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, spectral_data, collection_date, sensor_id FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT spectral_data, collection_date, sensor_id, id FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id, collection_date, spectral_data, id FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_id, spectral_data, collection_date FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, collection_date, sensor_id, spectral_data FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND id > 5;
SELECT * FROM hyperspectral_data ORDER BY collection_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, collection_date FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE sensor_id = 101 ORDER BY collection_date LIMIT 10;

SELECT rd.id, rd.collection_date, rf.facility_name FROM hyperspectral_data rd JOIN research_facilities rf ON rd.sensor_id = rf.facility_id WHERE rd.sensor_id = 101 ORDER BY rd.collection_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sensor_id = 101 ORDER BY collection_date LIMIT 10;
SELECT rd.id, rd.spectral_data ->> 'band_3' AS band_3_data FROM hyperspectral_data rd WHERE rd.sensor_id = 102 ORDER BY rd.id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT wavelength_range, spatial_resolution, sensor_type FROM hyperspectral_data;
SELECT * FROM remote_sensing_platforms WHERE platform_type = 'Satellite';
SELECT platform_name, manufacture_year, spectral_range FROM remote_sensing_platforms ORDER BY manufacture_year DESC;
SELECT project_name, researcher_name, start_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, researcher_name FROM research_projects WHERE researcher_name = 'Jane Doe';
SELECT wavelength_range, sensor_type FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE spatial_resolution > 0.1;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type, manufacture_year FROM remote_sensing_platforms WHERE spectral_range = 'Visible';
SELECT project_name, researcher_name FROM research_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM hyperspectral_data ORDER BY spatial_resolution DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, researcher_name FROM research_projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM hyperspectral_data;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM sensing_platform ORDER BY platform_name DESC;
SELECT partner_name, institution FROM research_partners WHERE institution = 'University XYZ';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT lead_researcher AS 'Research Lead', project_name FROM research_projects WHERE start_date < '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM hyperspectral_data ORDER BY collection_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, wavelength_range FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE id > 100
SELECT * FROM sensing_platform WHERE platform_type = 'satellite'
SELECT partner_name, institution FROM research_partners WHERE institution LIKE '%University%'
SELECT project_name, start_date, lead_researcher FROM research_projects ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM hyperspectral_data;
SELECT id, intensity, time_collected FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE wavelength > 500;
SELECT platform_id, platform_name FROM remote_sensing_platform ORDER BY platform_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE researcher_id = 101;
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation, email FROM researchers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM hyperspectral_data WHERE intensity > 0.5;
SELECT platform_name, location_geocode FROM remote_sensing_platform WHERE technician_id = 2;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation, email FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 5;
SELECT project_id, data_processed, analysis_date FROM data_analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
